item.description:
Hi All...

Another Happy Hour! How about some more wine?

Let's share some bottles of wine or have a few drinks and maybe some dinner.... if that's what you want, at Ivy.

TIME:
6:30PM

PLACE:
Ivy Restaurant (Downtown Crossing)
49 Temple Place
Boston, MA 02111

WINE LIST:
http://www.ivyrestaur...

I hope to see you at Ivy for some wine/drinks and maybe something to eat.

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Some Wine/drinks & maybe dinner at Ivy Restaurant
